title: I can't get into my main account! Please help me.
body: My main account is campbelll with three L's. Today I tried logging in like every day and it didn't work. I tried just sending an email but I have no idea what email I used since I've never had a problem. Im so devastated I've played this game since s4. I was finally really motivated and happy with my league account. Can someone please help me get it back!

replies.body:
If you ever think your account has been hacked or just can't get logged in, your best bet is to reach out to us through our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). We'll be able to talk about your personal account details there since I wouldn't want to give out that info over the boards. 

I saw you were concerned about not remembering the initial signup e-mail, but be sure to look over the rest of the questions they ask and remember as much as you can!
